title: Why isn't Varus 'VAARUS'
body:
there is a voice line referencing it, "varus, V A R U S, your name is suppose to have an A and then an R, there was a memo varus, THERE WAS A MEMO"~ very angry Aatrox 2018
and also
"we all agreed on the double A thing varus. THE DOUBLE A THING" ~even more pissed Aatrox

replies.body:
Its a joke.

Cebotaru is a darkin, and he has no double a.
Zigantus is also a darkin without double a
Syphax as well, lacks of the double a.
Xuuyan has a doble u, not a

ETC

> [{quoted}](name=Ebonmaw Dragon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AyAwPUlE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-30T01:28:47.931+0000)
>
> Its a joke.
> 
> Cebotaru is a darkin, and he has no double a.
> Zigantus is also a darkin without double a
> Syphax as well, lacks of the double a.
> Xuuyan has a doble u, not a
> 
> ETC

All contain the letter A 

All must be double AA and follow the memo

This means that Rhaast was somehow the only one who got Aatrox's memo and decided to go along with it.

What a champ. He really is the Best Darkin.

I mean Varus wasn't always a Darkin.
They changed his lore not too long ago to shift him to be Darkin based.
So his name wasn't chosen with the Darkin in mind at all. 
I believe the Aatrox voicelines are referencing fans who have brought up similar points about Varus's name.
I doubt Riot will actually change his name to fit the new thematic, though.

Double A thing was a jokey joke more like a wink aht the fans who speculated so long who could be the next Darkin and what names would they have to have. That isnt mandatory for Darkin cause you have Ascended with names like Cebotaru, or Naganeka.
He thought he needed two gays
{{champion:266}} Varus, where is your 2nd A? We discussed this double A theme Varus, there was even a memo, A MEMO!
